name: Chiroform Gymball 65 cm.
descr:
BESTSELLER

Chiroform Gymballs is for all traditional kinds of treatment using a ball, physiotherapy, chiropractic, back exercises, prenatal care and convalescence exercises, pelvic exercises (incontinence, geriatric gymnastics) etc.

Weight tested up to 500 kg.

Available in individual colours and private logo upon your request by order of larger quantities.
